# gd-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description                                                                               | Type                              | Default     |
| ------------- | ------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `disabled`    | `disabled`    | If `true`, the user cannot interact with the button.                                      | `boolean`                         | `false`     |
| `highlighted` | `highlighted` | If `true`, the button has a pulsating effect for highlighting the element in the content. | `boolean`                         | `false`     |
| `outlined`    | `outlined`    | Creates an outlined button that is flush with the surface.                                | `boolean`                         | `false`     |
| `size`        | `size`        | The button size.                                                                          | `"default" \| "large" \| "small"` | `'default'` |
| `type`        | `type`        | The type of the button.                                                                   | `"button" \| "reset" \| "submit"` | `'button'`  |


----------------------------------------------

*Built with [StencilJS](https://stenciljs.com/)*
